## Diversity in languages

Just a few examples...

- [**datos**](https://cienciadedatos.github.io/datos/) - Provides the Spanish translation of English data sets originally available in other R packages

- [**dados**](https://cienciadedatos.github.io/dados/) - Provides the Portuguese translation of English data sets originally available in other R packages

- [R4DS en espanol](https://r4ds-en-espaniol.netlify.app/) and in many other languages!

- [RLadies Global on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDgj5-mFohWZ5irWSFMFcng)
